title: Kings Mountain National Military Park: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger       Kids become a Kings Mountain NMP Junior Ranger. The Junior Ranger program is designed for kids ages 5 and up. Stop by the front desk to pick up your activity booklet or download a copy here. Upon completion you will receive a patch, badge and cerfiticate. Junior Ranger Motto: Explore, Learn, and Protect.
